de.jannlab.training

Class RandomSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.jannlab.training.NetTrainer
      • de.jannlab.training.RandomSearch

  • public final class RandomSearch
extends NetTrainer
    This class implements a simple RandomSearch learning algorithm. Per epoch a new random weight vector is generated and at the end of the training the best found vector will be kept.

    Author:
    Sebastian Otte
